66809.name: 17.2.1 - Net official development assistance (ODA) to LDCs as a percentage of OECD-DAC donors' GNI, by donor - DC_ODA_LDCG - Percent
66809.datasetName: Net official development assistance, total and to least developed countries, as a proportion of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) Development Assistance Committee donors’ gross national income (GNI)
66809.s_name: Net official development assistance, total and to least developed countries, as a proportion of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) Development Assistance Committee donors’ gross national income (GNI)

source.name: Net official development assistance, total and to least developed countries, as a proportion of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) Development Assistance Committee donors’ gross national income (GNI)
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
The indicator Net official development assistance, total and to least developed countries, as a proportion 
of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) Development Assistance 
Committee donors' gross national income (GNI) is defined as Net ODA disbursements as a per cent of 
GNI. 
 
Comments and limitations: 
 
Data are available from 1960. 
 

Data Availability 

 
On a donor basis for all DAC countries and many non-DAC providers (bilateral and multilateral) that 
report to the DAC.
